title: EVERETT - WILL NOT LAST! Great one bedroom in quiet building.
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 67702388', 'Rent: $1,650 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'For apartment value, this is a great choice.', ' For much less than the cost of living in one of the brand new apartment buildings built nearby, you can live in a clean, well maintained, professionally managed apartment building owned by Mastrocola Management.', ' Upon vacancy, each one bedroom apartment is given a complete “top to bottom inspection” to be sure everything is just the way you’d expect it to be.', ' The location of this property is as good as any property in Everett.', " Located just outside Everett Square, you'll have convenient access to all of the retail businesses nearby.", " With a very short walk, you'll be able to visit restaurants, banks, stores, and bakeries on Norwood Street and Broadway.", 'If you plan on commuting to work by MBTA, the property is a very short walk to four different bus routes on Broadway and Main Street.', ' Bus routes 97, 106, 109 and 112 will quickly bring you to the Orange Line or the Encore Casino.', ' Everett is a leader in providing dedicated “express” travel lanes for MBTA buses.', ' If you have an automobile, you will be provided an assigned parking spot in our well lit off street parking lot.', ' From this convenient central Everett location, you will have easy access south towards Boston or north towards Saugus via Route One.', 'So, save money and avoid the high cost of a brand new apartment.', ' Rent one of our well maintained apartments for a fraction of the cost.', ' Each resident pays for their own electric baseboard heat.', ' Hot water is included in the rent.', ' There is a coin operated laundry equipment available for your convenience.', ' This property is professionally managed by Mastrocola Management, known for providing clean, well maintained properties and prompt dependable service.', ' If you become one of our tenants, you will be respected as a valued customer.', '  Good credit and references a must to qualify.', 'Quiet, 18 unit building.', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Carpet', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'Courtyard', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Separate Kitchen']
